content.text:
# 2016 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards

| network     = Multishow
| ratings     =
| previous    = 2015
| main        = Multishow Brazilian Music Awards
| next        = 2017
}}
The 2016 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2016 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2016) was held on 25 October 2016, at the Rio Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Television presenters Fábio Porchat and Tatá Werneck hosted the show.

Winners and nominees
Céu were the most nominated artist, with nine nominations, followed by Anitta with eight. Céu received the most awards with four. Winners appear first and highlighted in bold.
Voted categories
The winners of the following categories were chosen by fan votes.

! style="background:#EEDD82;width:50%"| Best Male Singer

The winners of the following categories were chosen by members of the music industry.
